casebody.data:
SED Holdings, LLC
v.
3 Star Properties, LLC, et al. 211PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2017

*373R. Hayes Hofler, III, Attorney at Law, Durham, Keith B. Nichols, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For 3 Star Properties, LLC, et al.

Douglas W. Hanna, Attorney at Law, Mark R. Sigmon, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For SED Holdings, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of January 2017 by Defendant to Allow Time to Respond to Motion of Plaintiff to Dissolve the PDR Allowed by this Court:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2017."
